content:
With codeActionGroups, is it guaranteed that every code action will have a group, or can we have actions without groups?

Also smol implementation preview for rust-tools.nvim :P

image.png
Only code actions that make use of groups have groups set
So flip_comma will never have a group label set
If you mean whether a grouped action will have a group set even if it is alone then yes it will always come with the group set even if it is the only action in the group
and how is it supposed to be rendered if that's the case? with the group or without?
The VSCode extension renders it without the group
which makes sense in my opinion because adding the grouping tab in that case just adds an extra unnecessary input action required by the user
